LanguageData.WC_ColumnEnableDesc: Toggles the ON/OFF state of managing the specific task.
LanguageData.WC_ModEnableDesc: Toggles the ON/OFF state of Works Controller.
LanguageData.WC_ModWarningDesc: Changing the settings will not interrupt the work you have already started.
LanguageData.WC_ModStopCurJobAndReeval: Now re-evaluate the current work of the colonists.
LanguageData.WC_NoChangePawnsWork: There is no change in the current work of the colonists.
LanguageData.WC_FileSaveInvalid: The file couldn't be save successfully.
LanguageData.WC_FileDeleteInvalid: The file couldn't be delete successfully.
